name: 灌籃高手 SLAM DUNK
recommend_ls: ['三國戰神記-群雄激鬥，熱血無雙', '全明星亂鬥', '蒼天英雄誌', '雀姬（日本麻雀）', '亂鬥英雄志-名將風雲錄']
describe: 灌籃高手！熱血不滅！稱霸全國！《灌籃高手SLAMDUNK》是一款真人實時籃球競技手遊，由DeNA發行，東映動畫授權並全程監制。遊戲以井上雄彥原作漫畫、東映動畫製作的同名動畫片《灌籃高手》改編而成，玩家可操控原作出場角色，習得技能，體驗原作動畫的經典劇情和各個高校球隊的強大實力，感受競技賽事帶來的熱血與感動。學生時代耳熟能詳的「哼哼防守」、「大猩猩灌籃」、「電光火石」每位球員的絕招將被一一還原，為每位球員打造一份專屬的技能清單。．東映正版授權！經典劇情完整還原！PVE玩法將為大家呈現出十多個經典的動畫劇情章節。親身體驗一回湘北籃球新人櫻木花道的成長史，重溫那個青春洋溢的夏天。．實時多人競技！多種玩法展現你的球技！除核心的3V3半場模式外，更有1V1鬥牛、2V2組隊、3V3全場、單人5V5全場等多種比賽模式。與落單的隊友一起匹配組隊，體驗團體競技的魅力。．全國排位賽開打！與好友稱霸全國！排位賽以3V3半場作為比賽模式，3分鐘一場，與好友團隊合作，展現自我技巧，與好友共同贏得勝利，挑戰全國好手，爭奪「全服第一」稱霸全國。．角色全收錄！台日原班聲優獻聲！東映動畫正版授權，灌籃高手動畫中角色全收錄。．天才籃球高手誕生！挑戰全國贏得冠軍！遊戲中還原櫻木花道、流川楓、仙道彰、牧紳一等經典角色的經典技能，運用你的籃球智慧，擊敗來自全國的挑戰者，贏得勝利，稱霸全國。．跨服競技榮耀戰區開打！3分鐘公平競賽！跨服匹配隨時開打，一鍵加好友功能，隨時隨地與好友開賽，挑戰榮耀戰區代表你的城市出戰，爭奪成為全國最強籃球員。

name: KartRider Rush+
recommend_ls: ['Darkness Rises', 'Godzilla Defense Force', 'MapleStory M - Open World MMORPG', 'Stardew Valley', 'Golf Star™']
describe: The kart racing sensation enjoyed by over 300M players worldwide is back and better than ever with more style, more game modes, more thrill! Race with friends or just play it solo through a variety of gameplay modes. Collect and upgrade iconic characters and karts from the KartRider universe. Climb the leaderboard ranks and become the ultimate racing legend!A Heroic Tale Unfolds! The stories behind what drives the Racers are finally brought to light! Experience an immersive story mode unique to the KartRider franchise that introduces you to the various gameplay modes! Master the ModesWhether it’s chasing glory as a lone racer or rising to the top of the leaderboards as a team, it’s you who will decide your own path. Select from a variety of gameplay modes that will pave your way to victory.Speed Race: Earn licenses that unlock more challenging race tracks as you progress and rely on pure drifting skills to reach the finish lineArcade Mode: Choose from a selection of gameplay modes such as Item Race, Infini-Boost, or Lucci Runner that add an extra layer of fast-paced thrill to your racesRanked Mode: From Bronze to Living Legend, climb up the Racing Tiers and earn respect among your peers Story Mode: Join Dao and friends and help them stop the treacherous Pirate Captain Lodumani’s evil deedsTime Trial: Beat the clock and make your mark as the fastest racerDrift in StyleKart racing has never looked so good! Style your Racer in the latest outfits and accessories and go BOLD with a selection of stylish and iconic Karts. Adorn your ride with trendy decals and pets that will earn you prestige on the tracks.Become a Racing LegendTake the wheel and show your rivals what true speed is all about though competitive multiplayer matches in real-time. Leverage the drifting controls optimized for mobile, time your Nitro boosts to make for the perfect drift, and leave your opponents in the dust!Go Faster TogetherJoin forces with players from around the world and complete quests together as a Club. Show off your latest kart through your own private customizable Home or cool off from a hard-earned match with fun, quick mini-games.Race Tracks on Another LevelAccelerate to the finish line through over 45+ race tracks! Whether you’re taking a tour through the bustling traffic in London Nights, or enduring the biting chill of the ice in Shark’s Tomb, every track has their own distinctive traits that offer a different racing experience for players looking for a challenge.Follow Us:Official Site: https://kartrush.nexon.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/kartriderrushplusTwitter: https://twitter.com/KRRushPlusInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/kartriderrushplusInstagram (South East Asia): https://www.instagram.com/kartriderrushplus_seaTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kartriderrushplusNote: An internet connection is required to play this game.*For the best gaming experience, the following specs are recommended: AOS 4.4 or higher / Galaxy Note 3 or higher / Minimum 1GB RAM required*- Terms of Service: https://m.nexon.com/terms/304- Privacy Policy: https://m.nexon.com/terms/305 ■ Smartphone App Permissions[Smartphone App Permissions]We are requesting certain app permissions to provide the below services.[Optional App Permissions]Photo/Media/File: Saving images, uploading photos/videos.Phone: Collecting numbers for promotional texts.Camera: Taking photos or filming videos for uploading.Mic: Talking during the game.* Game can still be played if you do not grant these permissions.[How to Withdraw Permissions]▶ Android above 6.0: Settings > App > Select App > Permission List > Allow/Deny Permission▶ Android below 6.0: Upgrade the OS to deny permissions, or delete the app* The game may not initially offer individual permission settings; in this case, use the above method to adjust permissions.* This app offers in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your device settings.

name: Exos Heroes
recommend_ls: ['Royal Crown', 'First Summoner', 'Epic Seven', 'Romancing SaGa Re;univerSe', 'Aura Kingdom 2']
describe: VISUALISM PLAY !The grand adventure to search for ‘Exestruk’, the missing sword of the emperor, and the curse of the ancient dragon!Experience the adventure of your lifetime.Experience the unique visualism beyond your imagination.Experience the unique, extraordinary RPG!VISUALISM PLAY ≪Exos Heroes≫[Game Description]The grand adventure to search for ‘Exestruk’, the missing sword of the emperor, and the curse of the ancient dragon!Face the evil forces threatening the peace of the Exos Continent!■ Ride on the ancient Airship awoken from a deep slumber to go an adventure!Welcome to the mystical fantasy land where Airships roam the sky.Become the Airship captain and feel the vast world!Join the ancient dragon Bitru and treasure hunter Zeon in this original RPGExperience this fascinating story unfold before your eyes.■ Walk and run! World-map with freedom!This world is full of exciting contents where you can explore the lost ruins and hunt for lost treasures.Experience the unique contents of Exos, the original RPG on mobile!■ Epic graphics! It’s not a cinematic video!Intense battles in a fairytale-like world!Thrilling skill actions! Experience the true fun of turn-based game through strategic battles!Illustrations of beautiful characters, and the fantasy world of magnificent landscapes.■ Enjoy a new type of RPG with battle system like no other!Take advantage of Guardian Stone system to ‘break’ the enemy, and add more fun to strategic battles!■ The quality of every single character in the game are as fine as the main character! Collect more heroes!Collect over 200 heroes with unique character designs, and enjoy the awesome play with powerful Fatecore!Fiery intense battles will bring satisfaction to both your eyes and heart!

name: Recharge Please!
recommend_ls: ['Water Me Please! Water Game: Brain Teaser', 'Fuzzy Pet Health', 'Water Pipes Original', 'Back-Up Care', 'Cave Bowling']
describe: Play with just one finger.Connect all the plugs to a matching socket. But, as in real life, it isn't as easy as it sounds!Puzzle game with one finger control. Easy to play, hard to master.

name: 阿卡迪亞
recommend_ls: ['漢家江湖', '論如何建立一個修仙門派', 'Drake n Trap', '命運的反抗者', '校花的貼身高手-99分校花']
describe: –––––––遊戲特點–––––––【開局就送五次十連抽：任選一組獲得】● 粉絲大回饋！註冊角色就送五次十連抽機會！您可任選一組獲得，抽到手軟！性格各異的小姐姐，已經在阿卡迪亞的世界等著你了呦！【日本原畫師親製：頂級立繪】● 日本超一線畫師為角色賦予新的靈魂，現已加入超過38張手繪原畫，快來下載遊戲讓神之子們在你的手機中留下最靚麗的身影。【玩法輕鬆簡單：掛機放置】● 每日工作、學習壓力巨大，來這裡放鬆一下，手指動動即可領取滿滿的掛機獎勵！只需躺著就可養成男神女神，SSR輕鬆入手！【內容豐富多樣：多人副本】● 多人組隊副本，體驗不一樣的掛機遊戲。更有試煉幻境、終焉之塔、神域挑戰等超多玩法，休閒中玩出精彩！【策略佈陣多線掛機：讓放置不再無趣】● 首創3×3方陣，搭配出無數策略玩法！引導屬於你麾下的神之子，打造屬於你的最強戰隊！【王牌聲優親情獻聲：喚醒你的聽覺神經】● 眾多S級日本聲優為角色傾情獻聲，總計超過38名！日本“光田康典工作室”原聲錄製遊戲BGM，觸動你的耳朵每一根神經！快來帶上耳機雙重享受吧！凱努特（CV：釘宮理惠）江小星（CV：小倉唯）索菲亞（CV:石原夏織）墨陵意（CV：梶裕貴）艾瑪（CV：佐倉綾音）奧菲莉亞（CV：鬼頭明裡）柳生櫻（CV：阿澄佳奈）玉織（CV：大地葉）–––––––世界觀–––––––千年前在鏡之大陸上覺醒了第一位神之子：倉頡。他創建了古帝國達沃爾恩和最早的文明。但就在古帝國最鼎盛的時期，倉頡突然失蹤，從此大陸紛爭四起。百年間不斷的戰爭促使大量普通人在瀕死之際覺醒為神之子。其中，最強大且最不可控的神格，被人們稱為“黑死病”。她擁有著雕零壹切生靈的力量。而戰爭也變為了最強神之子之間的較量。最終兩位天生覺醒的神之子與壹位凡人聯手擊退了“黑死病”，戰爭從此進入了尾聲。如今大陸逐漸穩定為三個國家：哲羅公國、刀鋒帝國和大洋聯邦，而神之子們則成為了各國爭奪的重要資源。這些神之子們在繼承神之力的同時，依然保有並非完美的人性，他們有的選擇了承擔責任，有的選擇了順應自我的欲望。但無論選擇如何，他們都比凡人擁有更多的可能性……–––––––聯繫我們–––––––《阿卡迪亞》客服信箱：gmarkadia@barleygame.com.tw 《阿卡迪亞》FB粉絲團：http://bit.ly/2W4c2gC如果您有任何疑問可隨時聯繫我們。●使用封測時賬號登入正式上市遊戲，即可領取"封測儲值返利"。※本遊戲內容涉及性(穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾或裝扮但不涉及性暗示)和暴力(有打鬥、攻擊等未達血腥之畫面)以及戀愛交友（遊戲設計促使使用者虛擬戀愛或結婚），依遊戲軟體   分級管理辦 法分類為輔12級。※本遊戲為免費遊戲，但遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務，請依個人興趣及能力進行適度消費。※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷，長時間進行遊戲，容易影響作息，宜適度休息及運動。

name: 夢境元素使-讓世界重歸光明
recommend_ls: ['作妖计：全球最火爆卡牌RPG', '楞嚴咒(唱誦)', '問劍蒼穹', '暗黑起源', '蒼穹劍訣 - 經典放置休閒仙俠策略即時戰鬥RPG掛機手遊']
describe: 【夢境元素使】於5月21日10:00正式上線，自動掛機戰鬥的冒險之旅從此刻開始，這個未知的世界，正期待著你來揭開他的真面目.===============融為灰燼的邪惡巨龍，仍在不斷地侵蝕著美好夢境中的女神之地。惡靈少女.莉莉安，趁機喚醒強大的邪惡元素靈，並試圖毀滅這片美好夢境！千鈞一髮之際，祈告少女.櫻乃用盡所有法力，向時空裂縫中的勇者們發出了求救信號。為了人類不被噩夢吞噬，為了美好夢境的和平，為了艾尼亞大陸的寧靜，請各位受到召喚的勇者們打開法陣，與你們的元素使一起來拯救美好的艾尼亞大陸，讓世界重歸光明吧！【遊戲特色】1.卡哇伊的美術風格遊戲採用了可愛的Q版日系風格，從戰鬥背景到絢麗的人物技能，無一不充滿著濃郁的日式卡通風格！2.均衡的屬性克制每個元素使都有自己的獨特屬性，不同屬性的陣容搭配將會產生有趣的化學反應。記得，千萬不要加入暗黑系！3.解放雙手的放置戰鬥就算你不在夢境時，激萌的元素使也會認真的對抗邪惡勢力。資源產出不會停，離線也能獲得豐厚獎勵！4.歐氣爆棚 十連必出五星元素使不管是開服好康還是平時隨手來抽，十連必出五星，保底到世界的盡頭，拒絕非酋，全民歐皇！5.休閒咖啡館掛機累了來咖啡館逛逛吧，不止有女僕點餐，還有蘿莉同桌送你鑽石、召喚券、甚至許願幣哦，不氪也能賺十連啦！※本遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為：輔12級※本遊戲內含輕度暴力，性（角色穿著凸顯胸、臀之服飾）※本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務※長時間進行遊戲，容易影響正常作息，宜適度休息及運動歡迎與我們聯繫，為您解決遊戲中遇到的任何問題

name: 逆襲吧英雄：我就戰
recommend_ls: ['戰棋天下 - 春秋七雄之霸業王者', '守護那桃園-三國單機塔防', 'EZPZ Saga——Chilled IDLE Fantasy', '少年趙子龍-三國放置卡牌策略手游']
describe: 《逆襲吧英雄》是一款Q版風格的動作類卡牌類手機遊戲。遊戲背景以三國KUSO題材為主軸，玩家們在旅途中將一路網羅三國武將，進行一段療癒人心卻又緊張刺激的笑鬧冒險。-	經典形象、Q版英雄熟悉的三國武將全面化身Q版英雄，給你全新遊戲體驗！每位武將在覺醒後還會出現覺醒技能，與天賦技能可能會讓武將的發展有完全不同的走向，要以控場為主掌握全局，還是成為一夫當關、萬夫莫敵的超級坦克？-	地圖推進、即時戰鬥別以為在戰鬥前佈陣完畢，戰局就會按照計畫進行！戰場中隨時有可能從後排突入敵軍，即時操作每位武將移動，閃招、圍毆、放大招，單手逆轉戰局！-	大圖國戰、運籌帷幄除遊戲本身推進關卡的玩法以外，另有特色地圖國戰，需要您的運籌帷幄，有效分配隊伍戰力，是以爆發力強行佔領敵方城池，還是以強效續戰力的隊伍持續打擊對方進行消耗戰？相信聰明的你可以根據戰局變化隨時調整戰略搭配！-	戰術隊伍、鬥智鬥力武將分為坦克、戰士、射手、刺客、法師等類型，隊伍組成考驗你的戰略力！是以純戰士與坦克進行搭配的物理隊、刺客與法師組成的爆發隊、還是加入補師成為平均全能型的隊伍，由你決定！-	封魔幻象、高額懸賞封魔台的強力世界BOSS只有合眾人之力才能擊殺，高額獎勵等你來領！本軟體依中華民國遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為：輔12+級本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品購買等付費服務。本遊戲內容涉及暴力(有攻擊、搏鬥...等畫面)、部份角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾。請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。

name: 官場風雲-王的逆襲之路
recommend_ls: ['蒼穹劍訣 - 經典放置休閒仙俠策略即時戰鬥RPG掛機手遊', '戰棋天下 - 春秋七雄之霸業王者', '三國大宗師-策略卡牌RPG', '修仙了不起', '漢家江湖']
describe: 《官場風雲》手遊是壹款模擬經營養成，官途宮鬥手機遊戲，官場如戲，處處機關，步步為營，弱肉強食，只要妳願意，即可大權獨攬，坐享天下美人 ！【高品質官途畫風】精緻畫風，還原古代宮廷環境，府上場景自由切換；【個性才女隨你挑】江山如畫，美女佳人任你挑選，子嗣聯姻擴張家族勢力；【文人墨客畫藍圖】四方豪傑，門下做客，會人會語，共謀天下；【南征北戰升豪爵】征戰天下，拜將封侯，官至極品；【合理經營得民心】合理經營，響應民心，百萬雄獅助您掌握大權；【聯盟盟戰拼兄弟】全新聯盟戰，兄弟齊聚，攻城略地。

name: DOP: Draw One Part
recommend_ls: ['Emoji Link - Line Puzzle', 'The Mystic Puzzland - Griddlers & Nonogram Puzzles', 'PolyLines 3D - spatial puzzle', 'Interference - the drawing game', 'Sudoku! - Tap to play']
describe: DOP: Draw One Part- fun and tricky game, which refresh your mind and put a smile on your face!It will make you feel both like genius and talented artist.Take you'r time to think the puzzle over, then draw the solution. Vast range of riddles to draw: from common daily things to famous cultural reference.Features:- Unique gameplay brings you a cunning combination of logical puzzles and drawing.- Fun and education for all ages- expand your general outlook with different riddles.- Smooth and addictive gameplay- Your finger is the pencil- draw the solution- Unexpected and humorous pictures will make your day!- Sketchy-looking game style will push you imagination and creativityChallenge your attentiveness and develop drawing skills now!

name: 冒險聯盟
recommend_ls: ['三國殺名將傳', '長生繪夢', '漢家江湖', '諸神學院Smash', '吞食天地Ｍ']
describe: 「奇妙冒險大世界MMORPG《冒險聯盟》回來啦！」「療癒的童話清新橫版幻想風格，結合清新有氧橫版場景！」「Q萌系巨寵聖靈結伴同行，守護你的奇妙冒險之旅！」「坐上開往未知的列車，追逐與眾不同的夢境，勇敢去冒險吧！」====遊戲特色====【橫版冒險 歡樂組團】匠心巨作高清遊戲畫面，Q萌幻想風的橫版冒險風格，都講帶給你無與倫比的視覺感官享受！分享不同職業的默契配合、高自由度探險、組團輸出，挑戰領主，多式副本和趣味活動中加深彼此情誼。【時尚炫裝 可愛萌發】兔耳、清新風、蘿莉塔、青春校園，遊戲中全身各部位外觀隨心自由穿搭！更有獨家坐騎時裝寵物-萌胖柴犬。冒險前換上新的風格，帶著胖胖萌寵去浪漫冒險！現在開始，萌愛出發！【家族社交 暖情社群】聊天、吐槽、即時語音，少年，撩妹分分鐘！一人刷副本，眾人陪互動，志氣相投，爽快翻倍，樂趣無窮！暖情社交，享受這一刻的輕鬆體驗!【全服一起打領主，熱血廝殺大亂鬥】兄弟，加入我的家族！擊殺領主，拿好康，靠的就是我兄弟！動我兄弟者必誅之！我們的終極目標是成為最強家族，橫掃千軍，稱霸泰爾，共闖冒險之旅！【清新有氧，免費保送至VIP12】擺脫儲值獲得VIP的傳統，轉變成以任務為主的方式免費獲得VIP！豐富的VIP特權，為玩家的冒險之旅提供快速的成長；價值不菲的VIP升級獎勵，助玩家戰力飛升。【好康暴多，讓你暢快不停】每日登入驚喜連連，8天登入送超萌藍鯨家族紅包、拍賣分紅、泰爾寶藏、神秘NPC彩蛋，海量彩貝珍珠免費拿！【溫馨提示】*本軟體因涉及暴力、戀愛交友 、性（遊戲角色穿著凸顯性特徵之服飾），依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為輔12級。*本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。*長時間進行遊戲，請注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲

name: Animal Restaurant
recommend_ls: ['Cat Forest - Healing Camp', "A Street Cat's Tale", "Miya's Everyday Joy of Cooking", 'Adorable Home', 'Animal Hot Springs - Relaxing with cute animals']
describe: This heartwarming management simulation game all starts with a stray cat in the forest.You're the owner of Animal Restaurant. Will you take in this clumsy, dirty kitty and let him work at your restaurant?You can learn all kinds of recipes,like taiyaki, strawberry pancakes, shaved ice, and spaghetti!There's even pizza and avocado sandwich!Mix and match all styles of furniture.We've got European-style dessert tables, Japanese-style fences, and Mediterranean-style ovens!You can also have an Alice in Wonderland-style garden tea party!Hire cute feline staff,including a ragdoll cat, a tabby cat, and a big orange cat!You've also got to get on good terms with an eccentric chef!As long as you work hard, you'll always have a steady stream of customers.Will you chat with this diverse crowd of customers?Will you listen to their thoughts, or argue with them?Learn about the customers' stories through chats and letters. You can even participate and change their lives.Hear about secrets, gossip and tear-jerking experiences.All of this and more can be found at Animal Restaurant—a simple yet cozy and cute restaurant that's all yours!Come open a restaurant and start your story!Kind reminder：It needs WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permissions due to video Ads.Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/animalrestaurantEN	Twitter: https://twitter.com/AML_Restaurant	Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/animal_restaurant

name: Tofu Girl
recommend_ls: ['ZOOM Cloud Meetings', 'TikTok - Make Your Day', 'Instagram', 'Cash App', 'Coin Master']
describe: Get high on...Tofu? It’s time to stack up your own tofu tower, get ready to jump over obstacles that appear from both sides. Land the girl in the middle of each tofu for more acrobatic jumps. [Game Features]◆ Cuteness at your fingertipTap to start. Help the chirpy girl to climb the tower of deliciously bouncy tofu trampolines.◆ Addictive gameplayRelax in the cheerful music and immerse yourself in the endless loop of tofu jumping! Try perfecting each jump to unleash the acrobatic genius hidden inside your Tofu Girl! ◆ Unlock more than 60 skins!Fancy new clothes for your girl or tofu? Collect as much gold as you can by making perfect jumps and completing your collection!【Game play】1. Tap to jump, land in the middle of Tofu for perfect jumps.2. Perfect jump gives higher score and gold reward.3. Use your gold to unlock more skins.

name: 神將三國—三國卡牌掛機類策略手游
recommend_ls: ['三國大宗師-策略卡牌RPG', '三国GO - 横向RPG三国手游', '三國又如何-最燒腦卡牌策略遊戲', '亂世妖姬', '漢家江湖']
describe: 《神將三國》是一款以三國題材為背景的全新卡牌策略掛機手遊，經典副本推圖，輕鬆掛機資源爆棚、九宮格佈陣運籌帷幄、三國名將任你調遣、各大陣營緣分任你搭配，更有全新原創副將玩法，上古神獸助您一統三國天下，坐擁萬裏山河！遊戲特色：晝夜交替，還原獨屬於您的三國世界在這裏，無論是白日的喧囂，還是黑夜的寂靜，無論是豔陽高照，還是月朗星稀，都一併呈現在眼前。時間滴滴答答的流逝，現實與夢境交織相會，還原一個獨屬於您自己的三國。副將切換，組建千變萬化的王者之師全新副將玩法配置，SSS神將任意切換，九宮格佈局策略盡顯，盡情享受收集帶來的無限樂趣，組建千變萬化的三國王者之師上古神獸，感受酣暢淋漓的浴火戰場青龍白虎，朱雀玄武，麒麟金烏，上古神獸助陣，烽煙四起鑼鼓喧天，浴血奮戰酣暢淋漓。專屬神器，助陣三國名將封神之路刀光劍影，醉臥沙場，耀眼炫目的交戰畫面，搭配各個武將獨一無二的專屬神器，披金帶甲，馳騁沙場，舍我其誰三國神將，運籌帷幄成就三國霸業數以百計的三國神將，種類繁多的個性技能，任你調遣，任你搭配，給你帶來暢爽的運籌帷幄體驗群雄爭霸，開啟橫掃三國的王者之路步步征戰，層層攀爬，這裏有歷史版圖的征戰之路，也有豐富多彩的副本玩法，更有掠奪爭搶的押鏢之行，還有層層攀登的千層瓊樓以及多人爭王的擂臺之戰。軍團爭霸，亂世國戰，吾有常山趙子龍尋找同盟，結交好友，軍團混戰，與志同道合之人浴血奮戰，亂世國戰，吾有常山趙子龍，一統天下，坐擁萬裏河山，助你成為這盛世之君

name: Mow Zombies
recommend_ls: ['Mission: Zombies Removal-offline shooting', 'Dead Spreading:Survival', 'Zombie Blast Crew', 'Puzzle RPG: Zombie Blast Squad', 'Zombies & Puzzles']
describe: Dear zombie hunter, the world has been destroyed, you are our last hope, zombies occupied our home completely, we will provide you with the last power of humanity -- weapons, please use them to save our world.Game features:1. Use only one hand to avoid and destroy the zombie horde coming towards you from all sides. 2. The thrilling zombie siege is visually stunning. 3. In addition to killing all zombies, there are more interesting quests to complete. 4. Get more featured guns to make you better. 5. Challenge the best boss to prove you're the best.                    So take up arms and start your challenge now!

name: 戀戀清庭-浪漫宮廷 戀人未滿
recommend_ls: ['深宫大燕-打造你的蓝颜后宫', '熹妃Ｑ傳-體驗後宮心跳之旅', '熹妃傳-第一部可以玩的宮鬥小說', '盛世男宠：一个公主七个夫', '甜點王子2 - 心動奇蹟']
describe: 集萬千寵愛於一身的浪漫宮廷少女戀愛經營遊戲甜蜜登場！清風拂青絲，彩紗盈羅裙，古今通外最全的少女換裝搭配！從知己到戀人，情定終身；從秀女到皇后，深宮鬥爭，時光未央，歲月靜好，宮墻內的少女，浮沉在世，不諳天命，聽從心裡的抉擇，追逐著宮廷戀夢.....【相知趁年華 四大知己 戀人未滿】霸道皇子、溫柔御醫、陽光暖男、天降病嬌，京城四大知己甜蜜相伴！人生如晝行閃耀的流星，趁著最好的年華，與知己相遇相知，換裝養成傾付心意，開啟每一段怦然心動的甜蜜戀情！【桃李滿園春 慢遊宮廷 細膩國/粵配音】外出遠遊打獵種植，培養侍從扶植義子，慢悠享受宮廷中的點滴生活。隨著跌宕起伏劇情的展開，還有匠心傾力製作的收錄量逾萬句的國語/粵語雙語配音自由切換，讓你沉浸在各種溫柔、細膩、浪漫的聲線中久久不能自拔......【霓裳施粉黛 萬千少女嚮往的無盡衣櫥】羽衣霓裳，步步生姿，柔情綽態，媚於語言。滿櫃綾羅應有盡有，從青絲到玉足，從古風到現代，琳瑯滿目，別出心意！這件不喜歡？沒關係，華服自製瞭解下，最好的永遠都會有下一件！【深宮敢鬥妍 寵冠六宮 誰主天命】姐妹情深？No！宮中爭鬥，是仇是友，人前姐妹，人後算計！請把握住天命，步步晉升，穩坐鳳架，立於不敗之地，無論是庭前芍藥還是池上芙蕖，唯有代表著皇后的牡丹才最能驚動京城！官方客服郵箱：cs@ludoogames.com官方FB粉絲頁：FB搜尋 @LDG.LLQT※本軟體部份內容及幻想暴力及戀愛交友，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為輔12級。※本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。

name: Push'em all
recommend_ls: ['ZOOM Cloud Meetings', 'TikTok - Make Your Day', 'Instagram', 'Cash App', 'Coin Master']
describe: Trace your way to the end of the level and push the enemies with your stick on the way! Move your character and make all the ennemies fall down (and maybe you will learn how to use traps?!)Be careful with giant ennemies and the fast ones, It's their turn to try to take you down!One-tap easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics!

name: Sudoku Joy - Free Classic Number Puzzle Games
recommend_ls: ['SUDOKU - Free Games', "Sudoku - sudoku master's puzzle library", 'Sudoku 2020 : Evolve Your Brain', 'Sudoku', 'Conceptis MultiSudoku']
describe: Sudoku Charmy - Free Classic Number Puzzle Games, which is suitable for sudoku beginners and sudoku experts. Whether you want to exercise your logic thinking or just pass your free time, play our Sudoku number puzzle game will be a great choice!Have a break with the Sudoku puzzles, rescue you from the busy works and heavy stress. Play it in anywhere and anytime. Choose the level you like, have some daily exercises. Train your logic and sensitivity to numbers gradually.Sudoku Key Features:★Endless collection of well crafted sudoku puzzles★2 kinds of sudoku gameplay:Level mode & Random Mode★3 kinds of grid sizes:4×4, 6×6 and 9×9 grid★4 elaborate difficulty levels:Easy,Medium,Hard and Expert★Detailed rules:Teach you play sudoku step by step★Take notes:Help you keep track of possible numbers★Intelligent hints:guide you through the puzzle when you get stuck★Statistics:Keep track of your progress and personal records★Daily challenges:Complete daily challenges and collect trophies★Customize themes:4 gorgeous color themes for you to choose★Adjustable brightness:Make your eyes more comfortable More Sudoku game options:♥Auto-undo mistakes option:Auto-undo the numbers which fail to match the final Sudoku solution.♥Hide used numbers option:Hide numbers which are already placed in 9 different cells.♥Number-first input option:Tap and hold a number to lock it and use it for multiple cells.♥Highlight area option:Highlight a block,column and row for the selected cell.♥Highlight identical numbers option:When you select a cell with a number,the same digits are highlighted.♥Auto remove notes option:When the numbers is placed,remove it from all notes in a row,column and block.♥Highlight the unique number option:When you select the only blank cell in its row,column and block,highlight the final answer for the cell.♥Highlight the same notes option:When the selected cell with a number,the same notes are highlighted.Play this Sudoku, you can train your brain anywhere, anytime.Have fun and exercise your mind at the same time with learn-able, and user-friendly fun math puzzles! You can gain endless pleasure and relaxation from the wonderful logic brain training puzzles. All your family members can join in, open an math crossword brainstorming,become great Sudoku killer!

name: 花舞宮廷
recommend_ls: ['熹妃傳-第一部可以玩的宮鬥小說', '熹妃Ｑ傳-體驗後宮心跳之旅', '紫禁繁花—天衣版本重磅來襲', '叫我官老爺 - 原創宮廷模擬當官手遊']
describe: ❤遊戲介紹❤《花舞宮廷》一款唯美古風、劇情模擬、養成戀愛手遊。遊戲中目酣神醉的古風場景，各類放蕩不羈器宇軒昂男性立繪，蟬衫麟帶珠光寶氣華麗服裝使人目不暇接。在勾心鬥角的後宮闖出屬於自己的天地，妳的每個選擇都是分叉路口，一念之間掌管六宮，或是智商不足打入冷宮！在遊戲中邂逅各有故事的知己，與其他趣味相投的玩家小主遇見，體驗現實中不可比擬繽紛多彩的一生！【一場場、一次次，我們相遇夏天，邂逅於宮廷中】妳初入宮一個小小宮女，與壞人相逢即是鬥爭的開始，需要在主線勾心鬥角擊敗其他妃嬪，幸好也有遇到貴人相助。逾八十萬字劇情文本記錄妳們的相遇。妳亦可與邂逅於宮中的玩家小主，相識相知結成一方宮院勢力，與其他對手唇槍舌戰，上演一場夏日好戲。所有妳生命中的美好邂逅，造就成今天繽紛綻放的妳。【一團團、一簇簇，彩雲起伏變幻，宮內多樣生活】跌宕起伏多線劇情，稍有不慎選擇錯誤，打入辛者庫。前路蒙上陰影，猶如烏雲密布。又及休閒玩法豐富，演繹宮中不同生活。司苑務農種地，處理府務日常，育兒打獵遊山玩水，也是閒雲野鶴。妳，暢玩在藍天白雲陽光下。【一套套、一襲襲，目迷繽紛霓裳，精緻華美妝容】海量古風華美換裝搭配，上百套綾羅美衣隨心更換，多重精緻的古典妝容任情挑選。隨心裝扮成異域風情媚娘，或端莊華貴女性、英氣俏皮姑娘，成為宮廷時尚天后。【一朝朝、一夕夕，緣起初夏悸動，復甦戀愛季節】夏天是戀愛的季節，宮廷是戀愛的場所。皇帝抑或臣子、風流才子抑或豪情俠客。招為男寵夜夜笙歌，朝朝約會。在初夏，重現妳期待的愛情。一股唯美古風、一場劇情模擬、一份養成戀愛。現在就開啟一段夏日般美好的生活，開始舞動心扉的戀情。※本軟體部份內容及幻想暴力及戀愛交友，依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法分類為輔12級。※本遊戲為免費使用，遊戲內另提供購買虛擬遊戲幣、物品等付費服務。※請注意遊戲時間，避免沉迷。
